channel.title: 508 Server and Client Help Need
channel.description: i am trying to use davidscape 508 server run.bat run2.bat but when ever i open them. the server.java in the file is opening up with the cmd. i don't know what to do. and client when i open run.bat it saying cannot find loader.class. but i put the right path of loader.class in and it's still saying it! please help! thank you!

item.title: 508 Server and Client Help Need

item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

i am trying to use davidscape 508 server run.bat run2.bat but when ever i open them. the server.java in the file is opening up with the cmd. i don’t know what to do.
and client when i open run.bat it saying cannot find loader.class. but i put the right path of loader.class in and it’s still saying it! please help! thank you!
